What We Do?

Web Design

We design Responsive Web Sites. We take care of the layout, deployment and put online.

E-Commerce

We partner you in the process of having your Online Store.

Apps Development

We develop Custom WebApps, from conception to production and support.

 

We are the IT Partner that will Boost your Business

Focused on results, we use our it experience together with the latest technology available in the market to accompany you in the digital transformation of your company.

Technology

Responsive Web Sites

The designs are adaptable to the different devices on the market (Pc, Laptop, Tablets, Telephones)

Bootstrap 4/5

Bootstrap is an open source toolkit for responsive web development with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

HTML5, C#, Javascript, React

These are some of the technologies we use for both Websites and Application Development.

WooCommerce

We use WooCommerce for your Store, together with WordPress it is the most used in the world of e-commerce.

Portable Applications

We develop Portable Web Applications, simple to install in Cloud services.

Ticket System

We make available to our clients a Ticket System for Feedback during the Development of Solutions.
